1.ruleText: You and your tribe are allowed two (2) bases per server.  Maximum allowed size for PAT RAG is 200x200 and 36 walls tall.  Maximum allowed size for PAT EXT is 200x200 and 72 walls tall.  You may temporarily have three bases if you are in the process of relocating, but please inform the admins first.

2.ruleText: There is a ZERO TOLERANCE policy on claiming creatures or demoing bases on the Patreon servers. Any player(s) or tribes that do so will be permanently banned, without the possibility of filing a ban appeal.
